name: Drift (itch) (Leaping Games)
description:
This is a 2d endless runner game made for android with two game modes like escape & endless you can play for hours and never get bored.

First before you download:
Week make updates every few weeks or even into a month but we will keep you up to date on our Facebook page.
Link to the page: https://www.facebook.com/LeapingGames/

Go play this game and see the endless possibilities!
